net.imglib2.cache.img

Class DiskCellCache<A>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.imglib2.cache.img.DiskCellCache<A>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - access type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheLoader<Long,Cell<A>>, CacheRemover<Long,Cell<A>,A>, Invalidate<Long>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DirtyDiskCellCache

    public class DiskCellCache<A>
extends Object
implements CacheRemover<Long,Cell<A>,A>, CacheLoader<Long,Cell<A>>
    Basic CacheRemover/CacheLoader for writing/reading cells to a disk cache. Currently blocks are simply written as flat files to a specified directory. createTempDirectory(String, boolean) can be used to create a temporary directory that will be automatically removed when the JVM shuts down.

    Blocks which are not in the diskcache (yet) are obtained from a backing CacheLoader.

    A DiskCellCache should be connected to a in-memory cache through IoSync if the cache will be used concurrently by multiple threads!

    Author:
    Tobias Pietzsch

        public static void addDeleteHook(Path path)

        Parameters:
